text: Julia v1.6 doesn’t build cleanly on aarch64 darwin yet.  I believe the next hurdle is to get a PCRE patch that Keno submitted to an upstream dependency of PCRE (to avoid a crash) but we’re not certain if PCRE has released a version with that update dependency yet

elements.text: Julia v1.6 doesn’t build cleanly on aarch64 darwin yet.  I believe the next hurdle is to get a PCRE patch that Keno submitted to an upstream dependency of PCRE (to avoid a crash) but we’re not certain if PCRE has released a version with that update dependency yet

text: A few years ago, I looked at the usage of regexes in Base, and it really wasn’t that much.  I wonder if people wold be interested in making Base no longer dependent on PCRE (PCRE / Regex support could then be moved to a stdlib)
